title: Team Maker 2015
body:
WELCOME TO TEAM MAKER 2015

THIS YEAR (and only this year) WE WILL BE CREATING A TEAM OF THE BEST PLAYERS AROUND.
.
.
.

In all seriousness. I'm looking to create a team to both learn from and grow strong with. I'm seeking players that are relitively friendly and can hold there own weight. I don't really care about rank (because that would make me a hypocrite) as some players are more team orriented and have trouble climbing the ladder. 

Current have all lanes open. Anyone that wishes to join can either leave a comment with prefered role here and ign or message me directly on league at "Hnp dawg".

Schedule is no existant but would most likely be any day of the week from 5 (EST).

Mic is required.

Thank you for taking the time to reading this.
- Harrison
{{summoner:31}}
